questions.question: Who/what should take Responsibility for the problem in the relationship

choices.answer: Martin (the boi who thinks he's the best but isn't really)
Daniela (Gorgeous independent girl)
Neoliberalism (It's always an issue)
Amartya Sen's capability approach

questions.question: Why does Martin have to take responsibility of the problem in the relationship

choices.answer: Climate change
Rostow's theory of economic growth
Post-development
Didn't open up, to protect himself and to avoid getting hurt

questions.question: Another reason why Martin has to take responsibility of the problems caused in the relationship

choices.answer: Brought luggage from previous relationships (explanation)
The notion of the Poverty trap
Didn't want state intervention in the economy (free market)
The labeling of countries (1st world, 3rd world)

questions.question: What was the result of the problems in the relationship

choices.answer: The Cold War
The relationship moved too slowly and wasn't progressing
The creation of the USSR
Inauguration of Pinochet into becoming dictator of Chile

questions.question: Another result of the problems in the relationship

choices.answer: Irruption of volcano in Hawaii
Martin showed a lack of public affection that should of been
Trump became President
White man's burden

questions.question: How did those problems affect Daniela?

choices.answer: Turned to communism
Did not believe in climate change
She didn't know where she stood in Martin's life
Did not believe in extreme poverty

questions.question: What did Martin learn while taking a few steps back to reflect?

choices.answer: He truly likes an cares about Daniela
He has to be fully open and integrate her into he's life
He has to be all in 100%
All of the above
